data.name: Gorgon's quest Demo
data.detailed_description:
Medusa is dead, beheaded in her sleep by the coward Perseus. You play as the mythical gorgon sisters Stheno and Euryale in your quest to track down Perseus. Find him, look him in the eyes and send him to Hades! Retrive the head which was stolen and deliver it to your sister in the underworld.



Gorgon's quest is a single screen action/platformer. Play alone or with a friend (local co-op) use your petrifying gaze to turn your enemies into stone.

* 100 levels
* Power ups like death rays, double jumps and wards
* Casual mode with unlimited lives
* Achievements
* Speedrun mode
* vibrant pixelart

data.short_description: Medusa is dead, beheaded in her sleep by the coward Perseus. You play as the mythical gorgon sisters Stheno and Euryale in your quest to track down Perseus. Find him, look him in the eyes and send him to Hades! Retrive the head which was stolen and deliver it to your sister in the underworld.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows XP, Vista, 7, 8/8.1, 10
  • Processor: Requires a 64-bit processor
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 256 mb Video memory, capable of OpenGL 2,0+ support
  • Storage: 800 MB available space
  • Sound Card: any
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: 3.0 ghz
  • Memory: 3 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GTX 680, AMD R9 260X
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Sound Card: any
